title: The Blue Screen of Death Karthus
body:
Hello everybody, a few months ago I went to Fan Expo in Toronto, where I saw a number of riot employees. I pitched my idea of the skin to them and they liked what they heard about it, so I asked whoever did to sign a poster saying that they support it.
You can see this here: [Support poster!](http://i.imgur.com/OhdTFq2.jpg) Each +1 beside a name or at the top right represents a rioter that supports the skin.

A couple said I should try and get some community support behind this, so here I go. 

Here is a quick sketchup design from  reddit user "TechnoScherzo"
[Picture!](http://i.imgur.com/yVfCfR4.png)

**The Skin**
**The Scythe**: A scythe made from old busted up computer parts, the staff part made from a tangle of wires, and the scythe blade itself made from old computer boards. EX: Sound cards, video cards, ram sticks..... etc.

**The Cloak**: A blue cloak, patterned with 1s and 0s to represent binary, and possibly a hidden message within them, with wires draping down the cloak as well. 

**The Spellbook**: Instead of a spellbok, he carries around an old discarded Laptop

**Spells**

**Death Defied**: When Karthus dies and becomes a ghost, with the skin he begins to seemingly glitch out as the passive times out, eventually fizzling into nothing.

**Lay Waste**: Blue bubble bursts from the ground glitching up

**Defile**: The active portion of Defile causes 1s and 0s to circle around him and rise out of the ground

**Wall of Pain**: Firewall of pain. Places a firewall in the targeted area

**Requim**: 1's and 0's and a bunch of random text appears above the champion. Killing them causes their screen to be a tinted blue instead of the grey. Kind of like when Zilean ults a champion there's a gold glow

**Animations**

**Dance**: Possibly a play on Steve Balmers "Developers" presentation

**Taunt**: "I don't need to crash you, I can defeat you the old fashioned way" Could also have special interaction with mechanical champions : Blitzcrank, Oriana, Viktor, Heimerdinger.

**Joke**: "bugsplat? Hah, child's play."

I am open for absolutely any suggestions, especially since I am not the most creative person out there. 

[Link to reddit thread](http://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/2nwx5a/skin_concept_idea_blue_screen_of_death_karthus/)

**Update** : I'm so happy to see all of the support this is getting. I really hope this goes through and something happens with this, if you enjoy it, send it to your friends. The more support the better!
